_comment: Solver Configuration - Copy to solver-config.json and customize

limits._comment_min: Minimum USDC amount to accept (6 decimals). 1000000 = 1 USDC
limits._comment_max: Maximum USDC amount to accept (6 decimals). 10000000000 = 10,000 USDC
limits._comment_daily: Maximum daily volume (6 decimals). Set to 0 for unlimited. 50000000000 = 50,000 USDC

pricing._comment_min_fee: Optional minimum fee in cents. E.g., 10 = $0.10 minimum fee

supported._comment_rtpns: List of supported Real-Time Payment Networks
